text: The 1981–85 Nordic Football Championship was the 13th Nordic Football Championship. Four Nordic countries were in the tournament, Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden. Denmark ended up winning their 3rd title. == Results == Lars Aarhus; Søren Elbech; Heikki Pietarinen, 'Nordic Championships 1981-83', Rec.Sport.Soccer Statistics Foundation (8 Jan 2000) Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Denmark 6 4 1 1 11 8 +3 9 Sweden 6 3 1 2 7 4 +3 7 Norway 6 2 1 3 6 8 –2 5 Finland 6 1 1 4 7 11 –4 3 == References == Category:Nordic Football Championship Category:1980s in Norway Category:1980s in Denmark Category:1980s in Finland Category:1980s in Sweden Category:Football in Norway Category:Football in Denmark Category:Football in Finland Category:Football in Sweden Category:1981 in association football Category:1982 in European football Category:1983 in European football Category:1984 in European football Category:1984 events Category:1985 in European football
title: 1981–85 Nordic Football Championship
